data.text: @bethlinas Unfortunately in BC Canada under @DrBonnieHenry we are following UK and just reopened with 1/2 vaxxed population 90% of us are not fully vaxxed! But summer $ mean more than keeping residents healthy
@bethlinas Not to make it about me, it’s just very striking the difference despite similar vax rates
@bethlinas And complete vaccine disaster, like in Chile 😕 I left a month ago but I’m lucky to have been able to and who knows when we can go back.
